sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TBCSPIIT007O ( CON_NO, GCC_CON_HNDL_DVSN_CD, CD_APC_DT, BK_DVSN_CD, GCC_ORG_CD, ALL_ORG_NM, LOWT_ORG_NM, ORG_DGE_DVSN_CD, ORG_RAK_NO, BLT_ORG_DGE_DVSN_CD, GCC_SNCL_ORG_CD, GCC_HHT_ORG_CD, GCC_RPST_ORG_CD, TYP_CAT_LAG_CD, TYP_CAT_MID_CD, TYP_CAT_SALL_CD, CRE_DT, ABLT_DT, ABLT_YN_CD, BK_ORG_CD, CON_HNDL_DT, CON_HNDL_STA_CD ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(CON_NO))+1,1) FROM TBCSPIIT007O), SUBSTR(#GCC_CON_HNDL_DVSN_CD#,1,1), #CD_APC_DT#, TRIM(#BK_DVSN_CD#), TRIM(#GCC_ORG_CD#), TRIM(#ALL_ORG_NM#), TRIM(#LOWT_ORG_NM#), TRIM(#ORG_DGE_DVSN_CD#), TRIM(#ORG_RAK_NO#), TRIM(#BLT_ORG_DGE_DVSN_CD#), TRIM(#GCC_SNCL_ORG_CD#), TRIM(#GCC_HHT_ORG_CD#), TRIM(#GCC_RPST_ORG_CD#), TRIM(#TYP_CAT_LAG_CD#), TRIM(#TYP_CAT_MID_CD#), TRIM(#TYP_CAT_SALL_CD#), TRIM(#CRE_DT#), TRIM(#ABLT_DT#), TRIM(#ABLT_YN_CD#), TRIM(#BK_ORG_CD#), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#CON_HNDL_STA_CD#) )

INSERT INTO TBCSPIIT010H ( CON_ID, CON_LG_REGI_DH, TRNM_STND_ORG_CD, RCPT_DH, RCPT_STND_ORG_CD, RCPT_DOC_NM, LG_TXT ) VALUES ( #CON_ID#, #CON_LG_REGI_DH#, #TRNM_STND_ORG_CD#, SYSDATE, #RCPT_STND_ORG_CD#, #RCPT_DOC_NM#, #LG_TXT# )
